NL Installatie- en onderhoudsrichtlijnen m.b.t. de fabrieksgarantie.
1. De plaatsing, de aansluiting en het uittesten van dit toestel dient steeds te gebeuren door een erkend elektro-installateur.
2. Dit toestel moet geïnstalleerd, verbonden en getest worden volgens de nationaal geldende reglementen op elektrische
installaties.
3. De technische bijsluiter dient te worden beschouwd als een onderdeel van de algemene verkoopsvoorwaarden van TAL nv.
4. De elektro-installateur is verantwoordelijk voor het gebruik van compatibele voorschakelapparatuur die voldoen aan de 2 Mount the luminaire and make electrical connection
geldende IEC normen.
5. Reinig het toestel enkel met een zachte en lichtvochtige doek zonder reinigingsmiddel.
6. Schakel altijd eerst de elektriciteit uit alvorens het toestel te plaatsen en te installeren.
EN Installation and maintenance instructions regarding the manufacturer's warranty. See seperate manual
1. Installation, connection and testing of this product must always be performed by a certified electrician.
2. This product must be installed, connected and tested in accordance with the applicable national regulations for electrical
installations. Accessory only compatible with TAL

DE Installations- und Wartungsanweisungen bezüglich der Herstellergarantie.
1. Installation, Anschluß und Prüfung dieses Geräts soll nur von einem anerkannten Elektriker ausgeführt werden.
2. Dieses Gerät soll in Übereinstimmung mit den nationalen geltenden Vorschriften für Elektroinstallationen installiert,
angeschlossen und geprüft werden.
3. Die technische Anleitung muß als Teil der allgemeinen Verkaufsbedingungen von TAL nv betrachtet werden.
4. Der Elektroinstallateur ist verantwortlich für die Verwendung von kompatibelen Betriebsgeräten, die den geltenden
IEC-Normen entsprechen.
5. Reinigen Sie das Gerät nur mit einem weichen und leicht feuchten Tuch ohne Reinigungsmittel.
6. Schalten Sie den Strom immer aus, bevor Sie das Gerät installieren und anschließen.
FR Instructions d'installation et d'entretien concernant la garantie du fabricant.
1. L'installation, la connexion et les essais de cet appareil doivent toujours être effectués par un électricien reconnu.
2. Cet appareil doit être installé, raccordé et testé conformément aux réglementations nationales pour les installations électriques.
3. La notice technique doit être considérée comme faisant partie des conditions générales de vente de TAL SA.
4. L'installateur électrique est responsable de l'utilisation d'un équipement de contrôle compatible qui satisfait aux normes
CEI applicables.
5. Nettoyez l'appareil uniquement avec un chiffon doux et légèrement humide sans détergent.
6. Éteignez toujours l'électricité avant d'installer et de connecter l'appareil.

FLORETTE

FloretteFlorette
NEW
Introducing the Florette—
an innovative pendant that captures
the various transformative phases of
a flower’s life, a collaborative creation
with local designer Frederik Degreve.
The adjustable slats, capable of six
different positions, dynamically em-
ulate the evolving stages of a tulip’s
growth.
Through precise alignment, these
slats produce an enchanting and
ambient light display, mirroring the
natural changes in a flower’s appear-
ance across seasons and life cycles.
The Florette’s design places a strong
emphasis on sustainability and con-
tributing to a circular economy. En-
gineered for durability and offering
endless personalization possibilities,
it encourages reinvention, reshaping,
and reuse.
This guiding philosophy has affec-
tionately earned the Florette her
nickname, ‘the flower that lasts a
lifetime.’

20 8 G 555 555Florette By. Delph
(Créatrice de matières)
By. Delph.
At the Design Nation fair in Kortrijk,
TAL and By Delph joined forces to
create a custom finish for the slats of
the Florette, applying chalk paint to
enhance their aesthetic appeal. This
partnership combined TAL’s innovative
product design with By Delph’s expertise
in chalk paint application, resulting in a
striking visual presentation. Each slat was
meticulously treated to accentuate the
natural beauty of the wood, reflecting
the artisanal craftsmanship of both
collaborators. The collaborative effort
showcased at the fair demonstrated how
the fusion of traditional techniques with
modern design sensibilities can yield
exceptional results.

specsheet - priceFunctional
Explore the “Functional” chapter where lighting transcends its traditional role.
Immerse yourself in fixtures that go beyond illumination, offering added functionalities.
Discover combinations like lights seamlessly integrated with switches from our sister company
Lithoss, providing a blend of aesthetics and control. Dive into the innovative fusion of light and
ventilation, light and acoustics, and light paired with advanced sensors. Elevate your spaces with
fixtures that not only illuminate but also enhance the functionality of your environment.
376377
lanoitcnuF
P.394 P.378 P.384 P.396
ACOUSTICS LITHOSS SWITCHES ORBITAL SENSORSLithoss Switches
In the dynamic landscape of the design industry, TAL and Lithoss, renowned for their high-end designer
lighting & switches, have found a common market and target audience. Recognizing the shared potential
between our companies, the design studios of TAL and Lithoss have already expertly combined their
strengths various times in the past to create a series of stunning products. A notable example is the
integration of push buttons with the distinguished Nobel Elbow in our bed lights.
Propelled by the success of these recent partnerships, TAL and Lithoss are committed to continue this
trajectory. We firmly believe in the transformative power of synergy. To affirm this commitment, we
proudly present the Berrier Junior Swivel — a special edition merging the iconic Berrier luminaire with
Lithoss’ SELECT wall switches. This collaboration extends to cockpit toggle, push button, or rotary dimmer
options, ingeniously mounted using the snap-on magnet principle. The Berrier Junior Swivel effortlessly
rotates and tilts, providing an ideal lighting solution for hotel rooms and various hospitality spaces.
In alignment with our dedication to innovation, the Berrier Swivel is offered in a variety of finishes,
incorporating our latest addition of three anodized colours into our essential product lineup with ease.

Meet Berrier Junior SWIVEL.
Lithoss & Tal’s design team joined
forces to write a new chapter in
their jointly successful Luminaires
story. They soon came up with
the idea of combining TAL’s
iconic Berrier with Lithoss’ unique
finishes and combination options.
A new product was developed,
Berrier Junior Swivel. The Berrier
was created with an intelligent
magnet system that allows the
Berrier to be rotated smoothly in
all directions. Please contact Lithoss for more info.

LITHOSS CASAMBIOrbital
Orbital signifies innovation, embodying a state-of-the-art luminaire tailored for diverse applications.
This cutting-edge fixture seamlessly integrates high-quality lighting, ventilation, sound, and smoke
detection, functioning as a versatile toolbox. Its fluid lines are carefully crafted to harmonize with
architecture, guaranteeing optimal visual comfort. Choose between the trimless version for an invisible
blend with the building or the IP54-rated variant for enhanced adaptability. Designed by Erpicum,
Orbital encapsulates a futuristic vision of versatility in lighting design.

see back flap 20 0,6 GAcoustics
Felt, with its naturally soft texture, offers more than just a pleasing touch. One of the most appealing
qualities is its versatility in design. Available in an array of colors and textures, it can seamlessly integrate
with any room’s aesthetic, providing a customizable option for lighting fixtures. Whether it’s a subtle
accent or a bold statement piece, felt can enhance the visual appeal of any luminaire.
Beyond its visual charm, felt also boasts practical benefits. Its sound-absorbing properties make it
an ideal choice for improving acoustics in any environment. By reducing echo and noise levels, felt
contributes to creating a more comfortable auditory experience.
The flexibility allows for endless possibilities in luminaire design. Whether it’s shaping it to cover the
exterior, using it as diffusers within the fixture, or incorporating it as decorative accents, felt lends itself
well to creative lighting solutions.
Environmental consciousness is another significant advantage. Made from recycled materials like wool
or PET fibers, it aligns with sustainable design practices.
In conclusion, the combination of aesthetic appeal, functional benefits, and environmental friendliness
makes felt an excellent choice for incorporating into luminaires. Whether enhancing ambiance,
improving acoustics, or contributing to sustainability efforts, it elevates both the form and function of
lighting design.
394395
lanoitcnuF
scitsuocASensors
Integration of sensors into luminaires offers numerous advantages, including enhanced energy
efficiency, customization, safety, and convenience.
By detecting activity levels, sensors adjust lighting to conserve energy and create personalized
environments. They also improve safety by illuminating pathways and enhance security by deterring
intruders.
Additionally, sensors automate lighting control for convenience and contribute to luminaire longevity by
reducing operational hours. Compliance with regulations is ensured, and valuable data on occupancy
and environmental conditions can be collected. Other possibilities are temperature, humidity or air
quality detection.
Integration can be achieved via various protocols, including analog, digital (DALI, KNX), or wireless
(Casambi), ensuring compatibility and flexibility.
Overall, sensor-enabled luminaires drive efficiency and innovation in lighting solutions.
(For specific needs or questions, you can always contact our internal sales. ).
